instructions.name: create_subscription_wallet
docs: Create a Subscription Wallet (Virtual Card) for a user

instructions.name: deposit_to_yield
docs: Deposit more funds to yield vault (add to existing position)

instructions.name: disable_yield
docs: Disable yield - redeems all shares back to user's wallet

instructions.name: enable_yield
docs: Enable yield earning - moves funds to pooled vault

instructions.name: execute_payment_from_wallet
docs: Execute payment - with automatic yield redemption if needed

instructions.name: initialize_yield_vault
docs: Initialize the global yield vault (one-time setup)

accounts.name: usdc_buffer
docs: USDC buffer token account (owned by yield_vault PDA)

accounts.name: jupiter_ftoken_account
docs: Jupiter Lend fToken account (owned by yield_vault PDA)

instructions.name: rebalance_vault
docs: Protocol-level rebalancing: Move funds between buffer and Juplend

instructions.name: set_emergency_mode
docs: Emergency mode: Disable yield operations protocol-wide

instructions.name: withdraw_from_wallet
docs: Withdraw idle funds from Subscription Wallet

instructions.name: withdraw_from_yield
docs: Withdraw from yield position (partial or full)

errors.name: PaymentTooEarly
errors.msg: Payment interval has not elapsed yet

errors.name: InvalidFeeAmount
errors.msg: Fee amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidInterval
errors.msg: Payment interval must be greater than zero

errors.name: UnauthorizedCancellation
errors.msg: Only the subscription user can cancel

errors.name: SessionTokenTooLong
errors.msg: Session token exceeds maximum length (64 characters)

errors.name: YieldAmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Yield amount too small after buffer calculation
